page.title: 08Tourism In Otley.
page.content: There are lots of different things to see in Otley and the area around it.There are the agricultural shows in Otley and Arthington,the Chevin Fell Race,Otley Carnival and the county Rugby Union matches.The park is a great attraction with boats,an outdoor swimming pool and a bowling green. There is also the Otley Museum with many artefacts from old Otley.Along with the museum there are plenty of old buildings that tell something from history.The open air market has always brought people to Otley on a Friday and Saturday.There are 2 hotels in Otley which are the Black Horse and the Chevin Lodge.The runway at the airport which is 4 miles away has just been extended to except larger aircraft. By Kirsty Hall & Joanne Whitworth.
